mod.name: Dumb Attack Pack
mod.description: A strike based relic and some new strike scaling cards for the non-Ironclad characters.

cards.name: Rapid Strike
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Deal 5 damage again for every two of your other cards containing "Strike".

cards.name: Rapid Strike+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Deal 6 damage again for every two of your other cards containing "Strike".

cards.name: Defected Strike
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Deals additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike" times unique Orbs channeled.

cards.name: Defected Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage. Deals additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike" times unique Orbs channeled.
If you have any empty orb slots, channel 1 random orb.

cards.name: Patient Strike
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies. Deals 1 damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike". When Retained, increase additional damage by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Patient Strike+
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies. Deals 2 damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike". When Retained, increase additional damage by 1 this combat.

relics.name: Frying Pan
relics.description:
All attack cards are now strike cards.
If a card was already a strike card, it does 1 more damage.
relics.flavorText: Aah, you were at my side, all along. My true mentor...
